sent.orig: Therefore, test and verity investigate data's truth is this follow-up investigate's key.
sent.trans: 因此，验证调查数据是否真实可靠是这次追踪调查工作的关键。

sent.orig: Objective To investigate the correlation between direct and indirect measured arterial blood pressure.
sent.trans: 目的探讨动脉血压直接测量值与间接测量值的相关性。

sent.orig: Objective: To investigate about observation point and nursing measure of reexpansin pulmonary edema.
sent.trans: 目的：探讨复张性肺水肿的观察要点与治疗措施。

sent.orig: Objective To investigate the role of endothelin (ET-1) in the pathogenesis pregnancy induced hypertension (PIH) .
sent.trans: 目的探讨内皮素-1(ET-1)在妊高征发病中的作用。

sent.orig: Objective To investigate the efficacy of an operation to incipient pterygium.
sent.trans: 目的观察初发翼状胬肉的一种手术方法的效果。
